content: **details** i wanted to create a basic beginner friendly pullover that everyone can knit if you have never knitted a sweater this is a perfect first sweater project there is a **complete step-by-step video tutorial** for this pattern on youtube 1 here you will find answers to frequently asked questions about this pattern 2 this sweater has a raglan construction and is knit in the round from the top down meaning you can try it on as you go and add or remove length the yoke is shaped along the raglans for a classic style the sleeves are then returned to the needle picking up stitches for the underarm for a totally seamless sweater **sizes** 1 2 3 4 5 **finished bust circumference** 98 103 109 116 123 cm 38 5 40 5 43 45 75 48 5 *intended to be worn with 10 to 20 cm / 4 to 8 ease to pick your best size measure your full bust and add your desired ease then pick the finished bust circumference closest to that number sample shown in size 2 with 17 cm / 6 75 positive ease on a woman who is 177 cm / 5 8 tall * **yarn requirements** dk weight wool yarn 500 550 600 650 650 g *these are just approximations total yarn usage will depend on the yarn you use your gauge and any modifications you may make * **suggested yarn** peer gynt from sandnes garn colorway 1044 natural with tutti frutti tweed **suggested needles** main fabric 4mm / us 6 - 75cm/30 and 30cm/14 circular ribbing 3 5mm / us 4 - 30cm/14 circular **gauge** 18 sts & 26 row = 10 cm / 4 measured over stockinette stitch in the round after blocking *the needle size is only a guideline if you get a gauge with more than the provided stitches you should switch to a bigger needle size if you get a gauge with less than the provided stitches you should switch to a smaller needle size it is smart to always make a swatch to check the gauge before starting on the garment as everyone knits differently * **notions** 8 stitch markers one of them should be unique stitch holders or waste yarn **techniques** knit purl long tail cast on 3 german short row 4 backwards loop cast on 5 bind off in pattern 6 1 https //youtu be/j50twj_suu0 2 https //youtu be/ki3fezhmorq 3 https //youtu be/5mau6u0iijm 4 https //youtu be/m4s6g2eym0e 5 https //youtu be/padrybnklnk 6 https //youtu be/gjf0wjis6xi
